result.eng: The meaning of the sentence is unclear to me.
result.ga: Ní léir dom ciall na habairte
result.orig: Ní léir dom ciall na habairte
result.html: Ní léir dom ciall na habairteThe meaning of the sentence is unclear to me.
result.ponchtml: Ní léir dom ciall na habairteThe meaning of the sentence is unclear to me.

result.ga: Cén chiall atá leis an abairt
result.orig: Cén chiall atá leis an abairt
result.html: Cén chiall atá leis an abairtWhat does the sentence mean?
result.ponchtml: Cén ċiall atá leis an abairtWhat does the sentence mean?

result.html: Níl aon chiall aiciShe has no sense.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ċiall aiciShe has no sense.

result.eng: The sentence does not mean anything.
result.html: Níl ciall leis an abairtThe sentence does not mean anything.
result.ponchtml: Níl ciall leis an abairtThe sentence does not mean anything.

result.html: Tá ciall leis sinThat makes sense.
result.ponchtml: Tá ciall leis sinThat makes sense.

result.eng: You are going out in the rain? You have no sense!
result.ga: Tá tú ag dul amach sa bháisteach Níl aon chiall agat
result.orig: Tá tú ag dul amach sa bháisteach Níl aon chiall agat
result.html: Tá tú ag dul amach sa bháisteach Níl aon chiall agatYou are going out in the rain? You have no sense!
result.ponchtml: Tá tú ag dul amaċ sa ḃáisteaċ Níl aon ċiall agatYou are going out in the rain? You have no sense!

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.orig: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.html: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ag dul di ciall a ḃaint as imeaċtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.orig: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.html: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eileBe sensible and don't say such things.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.html: Bíodh crothán céille agatHave a bit of sense!
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ croṫán céille agatHave a bit of sense!

result.html: Bíodh trí splaideog chéille agatHave a spark of sense!
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ trí splaideog ċéille agatHave a spark of sense!

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
